name: currency-codes
description: Lookup currency codes based on ISO 4217

scripts.test:esm: npm run build && node --input-type=module --eval "import('./dist/index.mjs').then(cc => { console.log('ESM import successful:', typeof cc.code); console.log('USD test:', cc.code('USD').currency); })"
scripts.test:cjs: npm run build && node --eval "const cc = require('./dist/index.js'); console.log('CommonJS require works:', typeof cc.code); console.log('USD test:', cc.code('USD').currency)"
scripts.iso: npm run iso:fetch-xml && npm run iso:ingest-xml
